message.creatTable: CREATE TABLE SYSDBA.REGION_APPROVE_DOC_ATT_INFO(APPROVAL_ATTACHMENT_ID VARCHAR2(50),APPROVAL_DOC_ID VARCHAR2(50),ATTACHMENT_NAME VARCHAR2(512),ATTACHMENT_TYPE VARCHAR2(64),ATTACHMENT_CONTENT BLOB(4000),VALIDITY_FLAG VARCHAR2(2),EXCEHANGE_TIME TIMESTAMP,SHID VARCHAR2(50),CREATE_TIME VARCHAR2(50),CONTENT BLOB(4000));
